00010 #include <QGridLayout>

00013 FileGeneralTab::FileGeneralTab(const QFileInfo& baseLocation,  
00014                                                            File* file, 
00015                                                            QWidget *parent ):
00016 QWidget(parent), file_(file),
00017 nameEditor_(this, baseLocation),
00018 attributes_(this), 
00019 generalEditor_(this, file),
00020 fileTypeEditor_(this, file, QStringList()) {
00021 
00022         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00023         layout->addWidget(&nameEditor_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00024         layout->addWidget(&attributes_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00025         layout->addWidget(&generalEditor_, 1, 0, 1, 2);
00026         layout->addWidget(&fileTypeEditor_, 2, 0, 1, 2);
00027 
00028         connect(&nameEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00029                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00030         connect(&nameEditor_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)),
00031                 this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00032         connect(&attributes_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00033                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00034         connect(&generalEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00035                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00036         connect(&fileTypeEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00037                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00038 
00039         setLayout(layout);
00040 }

00042 FileGeneralTab::~FileGeneralTab() {
00043 
00044 }
00045 
00046 bool FileGeneralTab::isValid() const {
00047         
00048         // at least one file type has to be defined and the file name must be 
00049         // specified.
00050         return (fileTypeEditor_.isValid() && !nameEditor_.getFileName().isEmpty());
00051 }
00052 
00053 void FileGeneralTab::apply() {
00054         file_->setName(nameEditor_.getFileName());
00055         file_->setNameAttributes(nameEditor_.getAttributes());
00056 
00057         file_->setAttributes(attributes_.getAttributes());
00058 
00059         generalEditor_.apply();
00060         fileTypeEditor_.apply();
00061 }
00062 
00063 void FileGeneralTab::restore() {
00064         nameEditor_.setFileName(file_->getName());
00065         nameEditor_.setAttributes(file_->getNameAttributes());
00066 
00067         attributes_.setAttributes(file_->getAttributes());
00068 
00069         generalEditor_.restore();
00070         fileTypeEditor_.restore();
00071 }
